articles.author: Devendra Pandey
articles.title: BCCI won’t back hybrid model for Asia Cup, but no final decision reached - The Indian Express
articles.description: BCCI secretary Jay Shah had said that a final decision on the hosting of the 2023 Asia Cup will be taken on the sidelines of the IPL final
articles.content: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) will not back the hybrid model proposed by its Pakistan counterparts for the forthcoming Asia Cup, even though the meeting between office-bearers of t… [+2327 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: S Korea’s Asiana Airlines bans emergency seats after door opens - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The move comes after a passenger opened an emergency exit door midair, causing shock and panic on board.
articles.content:
South Koreas Asiana Airlines has stopped selling some emergency exit row seats following an accident in which a passenger opened an emergency exit door midair causing panic on board.
